backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles with access control and storing/submitting contact inquiries with admin‑only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files, their roles, and UI/logic purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming tokens, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app component switching between marketing site and admin views inside themed layout.
frontend/src/components/Admin/AdminInqui: Admin dashboard listing contact inquiries with loading states, detail dialog, and back‑to‑site button.
frontend/src/components/Admin/AdminRoute: Route guard enforcing Internet Identity login and admin‑role checks before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: A dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and submit it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Contact/ContactF: A contact form collecting user details and message, submitting via a mutation and showing success or error states.
frontend/src/components/Layout/SiteFoote: A site footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout/SiteLayou: A layout wrapper that renders the header, page content, and footer with view-switching support.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSite/Ma: Assembles all marketing sections and shows a profile setup dialog for authenticated users lacking a profile.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSite/se: Renders an about section describing the company’s mission, expertise, and approach with icon highlights.
Displays a grid of government-focused capabilities with icons and bullet lists of services.
Provides a contact area with a message form and contact details including email, phone, and location.
A hero section with marketing text, calls to action, trust indicators, and a hero image with smooth scrolling actions.
Renders a marketing services section displaying a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Navigation/SiteH: Implements the site header with navigation, authentication status, admin toggle, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides queries for fetching all contact inquiries or a specific inquiry via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and updating the caller's user profile and role using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactInqui: Provides a mutation hook to submit a new contact inquiry through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed responsive UI.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature lists, requirements, and image needs for the IT consulting website.
